min_print_temperature.description: Minimum recommended nozzle temperature for printing

max_print_temperature.description: Maximum recommended nozzle temperature for printing

preheat_temperature.description:
Nozzle temperature for preheat/MBL/nozzle cleaning
The temperature should be high enough so that the material is soft and can be easily cleaned off the nozzle,
but low enough so that the filament doesn't ooze.

min_bed_temperature.description: Minimum recommended heatbed temperature for printing

max_bed_temperature.description: Minimum recommended heatbed temperature for printing

heatbreak_temperature.description: Temperature the heatbreak should be cooled to.

chamber_temperature.description: Chamber temperature the printer should ideally keep during the print

min_chamber_temperature.description:
Minimum chamber temperature that is required for printing of this material.
The printer should wait to reach this temperature before starting the print.

max_chamber_temperature.description:
Maximum chamber temperature that is required for printing of this material.
The printer should wait to cool to this temperature before starting the print.

drying_temperature.description: Recommended temperature for drying the filament

drying_time.description: Recommended drying time (on `drying_temperature`) before using the material

min_nozzle_diameter.description:
Minimum recommended nozzle diameter for printing the material.
Some materials can contain added particles that would clog the nozzle if the diameter was too small.
